channel.title: Moblile Hotspot Plan
channel.description: Does anyone know if there is an unlimited mobile hotspot plan available from any carrier? Long story short I'm moving into a new apartment and can't setup a proper connection so was looking into getting a hotspot but I can't seem to find a plan with unlimited data.

item.title: Moblile Hotspot Plan
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:3, topic:517791”]I meant mobile as in you can move it around, I may be wrong but aren’t you able to use a hotspot signal with a laptop? i live in Massachusetts if that helps.[/quote]If a person has a wireless device that broadcasts their ethernet signal then yes as long as it is unsecured(or if you guess their network password …xD ) you can connect to their wireless internet.

Some cities/towns also have like a community hotspot however they are fairly rare and not to mention normally laggy from the amount on them.

Read full topic

item.title: Moblile Hotspot Plan
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

I meant mobile as in you can move it around, I may be wrong but aren’t you able to use a hotspot signal with a laptop? i live in Massachusetts if that helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Moblile Hotspot Plan
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

It really depends on where you live…but mobile as in cellular phone wise

Only Tmobile and Nextel(sprint) offer real “unlimited” data plans for a set charge.

Read full topic
